required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V for Obtaining an Optimal Depth of Right Internal Jugular Venous Catheter
clinical_study.official_title: Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V for Obtaining an Optimal Depth of Right Internal Jugular Venous Catheter : A Prospective Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators will perform a study to create formula for the optimal insertion depth of right internal jugular vein catheter.

detailed_description.textblock: Patients scheduled for cardiac surgery were studied.Determine the optimal insertion depth of right internal jugular vein catheter using Swan-Ganz Continuous Cardiac Output Thermodilutioon Cather (Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V).The investigators measure the distance between the insertion point and the junction between right atrium and superior vena cava using Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After insertion of the Swan-Ganz Continuous Cardiac Output Thermodilutioon Cather (Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V) and during operation
primary_outcome.description: The distance between the insertion point and the junction between right atrium and superior vena cava

clinical_study.condition: Insertion Depth of Central Venous Catheter

intervention.intervention_name: Swan-Ganz Continuous Cardiac Output Thermodilutioon Cather (Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V)

study_pop.textblock: Patients scheduled for cardiac surgery were studied

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patient over 18 years of age undergoing mitral valve or/and tricuspid valve
- Surgery under general anesthesia, requiring Swan-Ganz Continuous Cardiac Output Thermodilutioon Cather (Swan-Ganz CCOmbo V) insertion through the right internal jugular vein.
Exclusion Criteria:
- A change in the mediastinal structure from previous neck surgery,thoracic surgery or cardiac surgery
- Extracardiac vascular anomaly
- Anatomical abnormality in neck and thorax
- Refusal to enrol

overall_official.affiliation: Renji Hospital, School of Medicine, Shanghai Jiaotong University, Shanghai, China
